attributes.action: Establish a decent Broadband system in all rural areas of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rural areas suffer very badly in this country with the lack of a decent  broadband service. The Government appears to give this lip service but seem to do nothing to address the problem. We are constantly being encouraged to use the internet for all sorts of services and we in rural areas are very often not able to. We are being left behind. South Korea have almost every premises obtaining 500 times our "aimed for" speed of 2Mbps  it is outragous and needs to be addressed NOW not when it is too late.
